mapper.insert: UPDATE competition_achievement SET eval_status = #{eval_status}, remark = #{remark}, eval_time = #{eval_time}, judge_id = #{judge_id} WHERE competition_achievement.mat_id = #{mat_id}

INSERT INTO `competition_achievement (mat_id, stu_id, ac_year, mat_type, submit_time, eval_status, remark, file_url, eval_time, judge_id, comp_name, comp_level, award_time, ranking, award) VALUES (#{mat_id}, #{stu_id}, #{ac_year}, #{mat_type}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{eval_status}, '', NULL, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, NULL, #{comp_level}, #{comp_level}, #{award_time}, #{ranking}, #{award})
